app_name: 每日美愈-孕期运动产后修复紧致盆底肌
description:
「每日美愈」是一款孕产阶段的运动跟练APP，孕产专家1v1指导、瑜伽健身课程、每日训练计划，助你恢复健康身材。

「每日美愈」核心特点：
 - 孕产专家真人指导，多样课程任选
权威认证孕产老师真人指导教学，海量热门瑜伽健身课程任你选择

 - 量体裁衣，定制专属课程计划
针对不同问题提供科学专业的测评方式与解决方案，为您量身定制每日训练课程，高效修复与瘦身。

在孕产过程中你是否遇到这些问题：
 - 面对产后出现的各种问题，感到迷茫不知道如何解决？
 - 网络上难以找到专门的、可靠的、适合孕产阶段的运动视频？
 - 线下康复价格太高，线上练习担心难以掌握？

「每日美愈」解决的方案：
 - 根据用户孕产阶段、面临问题、修复目标编排各类训练课程。
 - 权威孕产专家，结合凯格尔运动、孕产瑜伽、普拉提等运动，专注解决孕产阶段问题。
 - 细致精确的讲解视频与动作标准有节奏的跟练视频，带你快速入门

身体和心灵的强健，都是女性力量真正的强大
「每日美愈」悦己爱上自己

每日美愈会员自动续费服务说明
「订阅周期」
连续包月：按月自动续费，每月缴纳一次连续包年：按年自动续费，每年缴纳一次
「订阅价格」
以iAP申请信息为准，例如连续包月产品为每月48元；连续包年产品为每年188元
「付款」
用户确认购买并付款后，款项记入iTunes 账户
「自动续订」
“连续包月/年”商品为自动续费商品，确认购买后，会从您的iTunes账户扣费。订阅将会自动续订，除非在当前订阅结束前至少24小时关闭自动续订在您订阅周期到期前
24小时内，苹果会自动从iTunes账户扣费，成功后会员有效期自动延长一个周期。
「取消自动续订」
如需取消自动续费，请手动在苹果手机「设置」-点击
「Apple ID」，选择进入「订阅」页面，选择「每日美愈」取消订阅即可

developer: Guangzhou Kangyimei Network Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
Your health assistant, all in Alod Blood Pressure!
Welcome to our Blood Pressure Recorder App! With the help of the latest technology and intelligent algorithms, we provide you with a powerful and easy-to-operate application to help you comprehensively manage and monitor your blood pressure, keeping your health in your hands at all times.

Why choose our blood pressure recorder App?
Data analysis: Our App has intelligent data analysis functions, which can convert your blood pressure data into visual reports and charts, helping you better understand the changing trend and make targeted adjustments.
Ease of use: Our App interface is simple and intuitive, and the operation is simple and friendly. You can easily record and view blood pressure without complicated settings.
Data security: We strictly abide by relevant laws and regulations to protect your personal privacy and data security, so that you can use it with confidence.

! Disclaimer:
Although our blood pressure recording app has been carefully designed and tested, please note the following disclaimer:
The Blood Pressure Logger app is an aid only and is not a substitute for medical professional advice. If you have any health problems, please consult a doctor or professional medical institution in time.
The data analysis and health advice provided by the App are for reference only, and do not make specific judgments and diagnoses on your personal health status. The content in the APP has nothing to do with Apple, and the relevant health information comes from the World Health Organization and is for reference only.

APP feedback email:guangzhoukangyimei@163.com

iPulse helps you take full control of your heart health and overall well-being. Easily track your heart rate, blood pressure, blood sugar, blood oxygen, and weight while monitoring your daily activity and water intake. Stay informed, live healthier, and make every day count!

Measure your heart rate quickly using your phone’s camera and follow daily trends with new core indicators. iPulse now provides step-by-step guidance when abnormal heart rate patterns are detected, giving you deeper insights into your cardiovascular health.  

Key Features:
√ Heart Rate Monitoring: Measure your heart rate anytime and track progress using enhanced core metrics.  
√ Blood Oxygen Tracking: Record your blood oxygen levels and monitor trends for better health insights.  
√ Weight Tracking: Log your weight and track changes to manage your health effectively.  
√ Blood Pressure & Blood Sugar Insights: Monitor your readings and view the proportion between blood pressure, blood sugar, and blood oxygen for a complete health overview.  
√ Activity Tracking: Track steps, calories burned, and water intake to get a full picture of your daily habits.  
√ Health Insights: Learn how lifestyle choices impact your heart and overall wellness.  
√ History & Reports: Access detailed historical data to track improvements and spot patterns.  
√ Abnormal Heart Rate Guidance: Step-by-step instructions when unusual heart rate patterns are detected.

Tips for Accurate Measurements:
√ Keep your phone steady while measuring heart rate  
√ Remain calm and breathe steadily  
√ Lightly cover the back camera with your finger—no pressure needed  

iPulse integrates with HealthKit to adjust your heart rate and health metrics based on your personal parameters, making tracking seamless and personalized.

Medical Disclaimer:
iPulse is not designed for medical purposes. It should not be used as a medical diagnosis or treatment tool. Please consult a doctor before making any medical decisions.

Premium Access:
Upgrade to Premium for unlimited measurements and exclusive health insights via a renewable iTunes subscription.
· Choose weekly, monthly, or yearly plans  
· Payment charged to iTunes Account at purchase confirmation  
· Auto-renewal can be turned off in Account Settings at least 24 hours before the end of the current period  
· Any unused portion of a free trial, if offered, will be forfeited upon purchase

Share iPulse with friends and family to inspire healthier habits together.

Contact Us: apple@shilutech.net  
Web: https://ipulse.shilutech.net/

Looking for a dose of daily inspiration or a way to boost your mental well-being? 
The Quote of the Day app brings you one quote a day to uplift your mood, spark positivity, and help you stay motivated.
 
Whether you're seeking motivational quotes, positive quotes, or thoughtful reflections for self-improvement, this is the best quotes app to start your day right.
 
Our daily quotes are carefully selected to offer life advice, encouragement quotes, and daily wisdom to support your journey - whether you're chasing goals, managing stress, or simply looking for a way to feel positive and inspired.
 
From morning motivation quotes to mental health quotes, you’ll get a new quote every day that fits your moment. These short quotes daily are perfect to reflect on, share with loved ones, or use as part of your morning routine inspiration.
 
Features of the Daily Quote App:
 
•	Motivational Quote of the Day
Start every day with a powerful quote to boost your mood, stay inspired, and set the tone for success. Enable daily motivation reminders to never miss your quote.
 
•	Quotes for Every Moment
Access a range of themes including happiness quotes, success quotes, inspirational quotes, and quotes to reflect - designed to match your daily mindset.
 
•	Mark as favourite
Mark any of the quote as your favourite and view all the favourite quotes at one place
 
•	Set Reminder
Set reminder to get the quote at your desired time at any time of the day
 
•	Share the Quote
Use the share quotes feature to share the quotes with other on. Whether it's a simple motivation or a feel-good quote, it’s easy to inspire others with a tap.
 
•	Theme the App
Set the theme of the app as per your requirement. Change the background colour, text colour, font size and alignment as per your need.
 
•	Widget Support
Place a widget on your iPhone Home Screen to see the daily quote, its author, and category at a glance - no need to open the app.
 
•      Apple Watch
Get inspired on the go with your daily quote right on your wrist. Check your favourite quotes, view categories, and stay motivated anytime.
 
Daily Motivation - Start your day with a fresh, powerful quote delivered at the time you choose.
Quotes for Every Mood - Explore categories like success, Determination, Hard work and Personal Development.
Favorites Collection - Save the quotes that speak to you and revisit them anytime.
Custom Reminders - Set reminders so you never miss your daily inspiration.
Easy Sharing - Share meaningful words with friends and family in just one tap.
Theme the App - Personalize your experience by changing background colour, text colour, font size, and alignment to match your style.
Widget Support - View the daily quote, its author, and category directly on your Home Screen without opening the app.
Apple Watch Support - Stay inspired on the go with quotes available right on your wrist
 
The Quote App is more than just words - it's a step toward better habits, improved mindset, and emotional clarity. Perfect for those seeking daily affirmations, mental health support, and meaningful reflection.
 
Thanks for downloading our daily quote app. Your feedback and suggestions are always welcome.

Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Tired of stress and anxiety? Welcome to Manifest, your personal companion for motivation and mental wellness.

Meet your new friend—a star mascot dedicated to being your biggest supporter. Manifest is a free app designed to help you navigate feelings of depression and anxiety with supportive chat, or to supercharge your day with positive motivation. We're your 24/7 resource for building a healthier, happier mindset, one conversation at a time.

Manifest is your pocket companion if you are:
- A student navigating the pressures of school, exams, and social life.
- A young professional looking to build confident habits and a positive routine.
- Seeking free, supportive tools to supplement your mental health journey.
- Someone who wants a daily dose of motivation and a space to practice self-care.

How Manifest Supports You:

YOUR 24/7 SUPPORT COMPANION
Feeling anxious or overwhelmed? Our friendly, AI-powered chat is here to listen without judgment. It’s a safe space to unpack your thoughts, process difficult emotions like stress and anger, and find a moment of calm. Think of it as a supportive friend, available whenever you need it.

TOOLS TO CONQUER YOUR ANXIETY
Searching for free therapy options? We provide powerful tools that professionals recommend for self-guided wellness. Use our Mood Tracker to understand your emotional patterns. Unwind with our Guided Journal, which offers mindful prompts to help you reflect and find clarity before you sleep. These resources help you build resilience and manage your mental health on your own terms.

DAILY MOTIVATION & POSITIVITY
Get your daily dose of inspiration with personalized affirmations, positive reminders, and motivational quotes. Whether your goal is to practice gratitude, build self-love, or stay focused, our tools are designed to help you overcome self-doubt and create a positive daily routine.

TRACK YOUR GOALS & HABITS
True change comes from small, consistent actions. Our integrated goal and habit tracker makes it easy and fun. Set your personal wellness goals—from journaling every day to practicing mindfulness—track your progress, and get the support you need to stay consistent and celebrate your wins.

A Day with Manifest:
Imagine waking up not with dread, but with a personalized, positive affirmation that sets the tone for your day. Feeling a wave of anxiety at lunch? Open a 5-minute chat session to recenter yourself. Before bed, spend a few moments with a mindful journal prompt to calm your mind and prepare for a restful sleep. That is the power of having a companion dedicated to your well-being.

Disclaimer
Manifest offers supportive conversations, mental health motivation, and therapy alternatives, but it is not a substitute for professional therapy or medical care. If you are experiencing a crisis or need formal mental health support, please seek help from a licensed therapist, doctor, or another qualified health professional.

Download Manifest today to affirm your worth, fortify your mental wellness, and experience the transformative power of personalized self-care—right at your fingertips!

Unlock your cyclical goddess era with Musa—where self-care meets science. More than a period tracker, Musa helps you turn your menstrual cycle into a source of power, not stress. Build habits that stick, boost your energy, and thrive all month long.

• Way Beyond Tracking:
Musa doesn’t just track your cycle—it transforms it. From mindfulness exercises to breathwork, every phase gets tailored self-care tools to help you feel amazing.

Think of this as your daily vibe check—powered by your hormones. Know what’s happening in your body and get science-backed tips to work with it, not against it.

Make wellness fun! Complete mindfulness exercises, track progress, and celebrate wins with Mussy, your playful self-care dragon.

From food to fitness to mood, get easy tips for each phase of your cycle. Backed by science, made simple for you.

Design your AI goddess guide to unlock your power in every phase of your cycle. She’s your empowering cheerleader every step of the way.
• Privacy You Can Trust:
Musa is built by women for women. Our female CTO, who helped develop Airbnb’s payment system, ensures your data is safe and secure.

Key Benefits:
• Reduce stress and balance hormones with daily mindfulness practices.
• Understand and optimize your energy, mood, and body throughout your cycle.
• Gain confidence with personalized, actionable insights that fit your life.

Who Is Musa For?
Musa is for women ready to unlock their hormonal power and take control of their health. Whether you're new to cycle syncing or already tracking your periods, Musa helps you feel confident, empowered, and unstoppable.

Note: Musa is not a method of birth control or contraception and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider for any medical concerns.

If you’re experiencing technical issues or have any questions about your cycle, our team is here to help. Send an email to support@musa.app or reach out to us on social media @musacycle.

Download Musa today and start your self-care journey!

Designed Exclusively for iPhone!
Take control of your health with Blood Pressure - Monitor Tracker, your all-in-one wellness companion. This app makes it simple to record, measure, and analyze your vital data, giving you a clear picture of your overall health every day. Effortlessly track your blood pressure, heart rate, blood sugar, weight, and BMI with just a few taps, and see how your body changes over time.

With intelligent charts and trend analysis, you’ll gain valuable insights into your health patterns—spot rising or falling numbers early, understand what’s normal for you, and make informed choices for your lifestyle.

Whether you’re focused on maintaining a healthy heart, balancing your blood sugar, achieving weight goals, or simply staying mindful of your wellness, Blood Pressure - Monitor Tracker gives you the tools to stay motivated and consistent. Designed with simplicity and clarity in mind, it’s not just a tracker—it’s a reliable partner on your journey to better health.

Key Features:
Blood Pressure Recording:
Conveniently log your daily blood pressure readings with systolic, diastolic, and pulse rate details. View historical trends through intuitive charts and graphs, receive insights about potential patterns, and get gentle reminders to maintain a regular monitoring routine.

Heart Rate Measurement & Analysis:
Measure your heart rate anytime using your phone’s camera with precise photoplethysmography (PPG) technology. Receive instant analysis, including HRV, and personalized suggestions to improve cardiovascular health. Track long-term changes and spot irregular patterns early.

Blood Sugar Tracking:
Record both fasting and post-meal blood sugar levels and view intelligent trend charts to understand fluctuations and identify potential risk patterns. Receive actionable tips for stabilizing your blood sugar through lifestyle adjustments.

Weight & BMI Tracking:
Track your weight changes over time and automatically calculate BMI to evaluate your health status. Visual charts help you quickly spot trends and stay motivated.

Water Intake Tracking:
Log daily water consumption and receive timely reminders to stay hydrated. Track progress over time to build and maintain healthy hydration habits.

Breathing Exercises:
Guided breathing sessions to reduce stress, improve focus, and enhance mental and physical well-being. Choose from multiple exercise modes, track your breathing patterns to optimize relaxation and cardiovascular health.

Health Insights & Tips:
Access a curated library of health knowledge articles covering diet, exercise, lifestyle habits, and wellness strategies. Personalized tips and suggestions help you make better daily health choices and improve long-term outcomes.

Apple Health Integration:
Seamlessly sync your health data including heart rate, blood pressure, blood glucose, HRV, and blood oxygen with Apple Health. Keep all your metrics in one place for comprehensive monitoring and analysis across devices.


Download Blood Pressure-Monitor Tracker to start your comprehensive health management journey today!

【VitalTide APP: Your Portable Health Data Manager, Making Health Management Easier】
In the fast-paced modern life, health management is often "squeezed out" by busyness—you can’t find paper and pen when you want to record your blood pressure, lack systematic data when you want to analyze blood glucose changes, and have no way to integrate multiple health indicators. To help you break through these troubles, VitalTide APP comes into being. It integrates the recording of multi-dimensional health indicators such as blood pressure, blood glucose and heart rate, and serves as your reliable health partner that you can rely on at any time with simple operations and clear data presentation.
Core Features: Comprehensive Coverage to Make Health Data "Traceable"
1. Accurate Recording: Every Measurement Has a Clear Record
● Blood Pressure Recording: Adapted to Daily Monitoring Scenarios  
Whether it is the basic blood pressure measurement after getting up in the morning, or irregular monitoring during work breaks, after exercise, etc., the APP has a convenient recording entrance. You can quickly save the data by manually entering the measured values, no complicated operations are required, and it is easy to track the fluctuation trend of blood pressure.
● Blood Glucose Recording: Distinguish Scenarios to Facilitate Diet Analysis  
For blood glucose management needs, an intuitive and easy-to-use dedicated interface is designed: it supports distinguishing between "pre-meal" and "post-meal" records to help you clearly sort out the correlation between diet and blood glucose changes.
2. Multi-Dimensional Coverage: Meet the Needs of Comprehensive Health Management
In addition to blood pressure and blood glucose, the APP also supports the recording of basic indicators such as heart rate, height and weight, and is also equipped with reference for healthy diet guidelines—from basic physiological data to daily diet suggestions, it covers your health management needs in one stop, eliminating the need to switch between multiple tools.
Disclaimer
VitalTide APP is only used as a tool for recording and organizing health data. It cannot replace medical equipment nor provide medical diagnosis or treatment advice. If you have any health discomfort, need to obtain professional medical opinions or make medical decisions, please be sure to consult a practicing doctor to ensure your health and safety.

My Calendar – Period Tracker by Simple Innovation is an elegant and easy-to-use period tracker that helps you take control of the many aspects of your menstrual cycle — from ovulation, fertility and periods, to birth control pills, moods and other symptoms.

Whether you are concerned about conceiving, birth control and contraception, or regularity of period cycles, Period Calendar can help. Our tracker is easy to use and offers everything you need: Track irregular periods, weight, temperature, moods, blood flow, symptoms and more.

Be PREPARED for your PERIOD:
- MAKE PLANS for rest and work
- Be CONFIDENT about your HEALTH. Add information to the app, use it to answer your doctor’s questions.
- Note SYMPTOMS, get insights. Use the charts to track changes.
- Track OVULATION and FERTILITY dates. 
- Keep your data SECRET. Use pin-code, face-ID or a fingerprint to keep the data safe.
- Take PILLS on time. Use reminders so you don't miss your pill time.

Discreet reminders keep you informed and prepared by predicting upcoming periods, ovulation, and fertile days. The app adapts to your cycle history and the calculator accurately predicts the important events during your cycle.

Key features:
- Vital info at a glance: intuitive calendar home page lets you visualize non-fertile, fertile, ovulation, expected period and actual period
- Entire cycle log and settings can be backed up and restored easily and quickly. Never be afraid to lose your calendar data, even when you lost your phone or get a new one.
- Detailed tracking: daily planner lets you save essential period information like flow, intercourse, symptoms, moods, temperature, weight, medicine, PMS, other cervical observations, and general diary notes
- Always stay in the loop with notifications for upcoming period, fertility windows or ovulation
- Protect your most private data from curious eyes: password lock it using a unique PIN code
- Personalize and make it yours: Gorgeous new watercolor themes, adjust period prediction intervals, luteal phase length, plus choose your units of measure and the first day of the week (Sunday or Monday) – all in Settings
- Abstinence mode hides ovulation, fertility and intercourse related data—perfect tracker for girls and teens just starting their periods
- Want to start fresh? Just reset it

You can track changes and symptoms during perimenopause, such as hot flashes, night sweats, mood swings, and irregular cycles.

This highly customizable period tracker and pregnancy planning calendar is perfect for any woman to take control of her health and keep organized.

Lose It! is a calorie counter and weight loss diet progress tracking app that helps you stick to your diet and reach your weight loss goals! Simply set your weight loss goals then track your diet, food and exercise to lose weight. Lose It! is more than just a free calorie tracker. You can track your nutrition, macros, carb and calorie intake, and plan your intermittent fasting schedule. Counting calories, tracking your food and losing weight has never been easier!

SIMPLIFY YOUR WEIGHT LOSS JOURNEY
Lose It! uses the proven principles of calorie counting, food tracking, calorie deficit and diet tracking to help you succeed. To get started on your weight loss journey, input your profile details and we’ll calculate the daily calorie budget and schedule . Then, easily track your food, weight, and activity to celebrate your weight loss victories. Change your calorie intake and dieting habits while learning about your nutrition needs to set achievable goals.

AI VOICE & PHOTO MEAL LOGGING
Quickly and accurately log meals using your voice or a photo. Just speak into your phone or tap the camera icon to track food and count calories in seconds. Snap a photo, log a meal and make your weight loss journey simple!

LOSE IT! BASIC FEATURES
• Calorie Tracking – Utilize the calorie counter to  it easy to track meals and exercise directly from your phone
• Weight Loss Plan – Build a weight loss plan based on your unique body composition, activity level and habits
• Community Support – Add your friends and join support groups to stay motivated

PREMIUM PLAN FEATURES
• Photo Meal Logging – “Snap It” lets you log meals by taking a picture
• AI Voice – Just say “I had 2 eggs, toast with butter and jam.” to log your meal
• Barcode Scanner – Scan food barcodes or search our database of items and recipes
• Advanced Tracking – track more than just calories including macronutrients like protein, carbs, fat, sugar; as well as health goals, including blood pressure, glucose, cholesterol, body measurements, sleep cycles and more
• Intermittent Fasting - set your intermittent fasting plan and track your fasts in the same app where you track your food
• Meal Planning & Targets – meal targets help you calculate suggested nutritional content including macro, carb, protein and overall calorie intake. Customize your diet and eating style for personalized weight loss!
• Weight Loss Diet Plans – access exclusive personal insights to identify what is hindering or helping your weight loss progress
• Fitness App Syncs – connect fitness trackers, workout apps, and devices like Fitbit trackers, Misfit trackers, Garmin trackers, Withings scales, Google Fit, Healthkit, and more to maximize your weight loss, gain or maintenance goals

Since our launch in 2008 we have been featured in The Wall Street Journal, The Today Show, Men’s Health, Women’s Health, CNET, Buzzfeed, CNN, Shape, Good Morning America, and more.

Lose It! has helped over 57 million users lose more than 150 million pounds. With a global food database of 56+ million items and recipes, tracking what you eat is simple and accurate. Choose from over 25 health goals—including macros, carbs, protein and calories—and start seeing results in just three days of consistent tracking.

Download Lose It! and join our weight loss community, full of members helping us reach our mission to mobilize the world to achieve a healthy weight. No matter your diet needs or weight loss goals, Lose It! can help you find weight loss that fits!
